newsitem.title: EGYPT: Starch and Glucose 1995/6 profits down.
newsitem.headline: Starch and Glucose 1995/6 profits down.

text.p: Food company Egyptian Starch and Glucose made net after-tax profits of 20.202 million pounds in the financial year 1995/6, 10.6 percent down on 22.6 million in 1994/5, according to audited results available on Sunday. The years end on June 30.
Turnover rose to 156.957 million pounds, 19.4 percent up on 131.4 million in the previous year, and profits before tax were 28.452 million, 8.5 percent down on 31.1 million.

The state sold the private sector more than 50 percent of the company's 4.6 million shares earlier this year at 30.00 pounds a share. The shares opened on the Egyptian stock exchange on Sunday at 39.90 pounds.
